// yuml.me
[Client{bg:yellow}]
[Cache|-data:Map(Key_Resource)|+get(k:Key):Resource{bg:blue}]
[Provider|+get(k:Key):Resource{bg:green}]
[Resource{bg:red}]
[Client]->[Cache]
[Cache]get if not contain->[Provider]
[Client]use->[Resource]
[Cache]save->[Resource]
[Provider]provide->[Resource]
[note: get_rsource_from_cache;otherwise_call_provider{bg:cornsilk}]-.-[Cache]
